name: Ridha Mahmood
title: B.S. Computer Science Candidate | Software Engineering Minor
summary: Computer Science student with hands-on experience in automation, data integrity, and building small web apps. Comfortable shipping projects end-to-end and explaining technical choices clearly.
target_roles: AI/ML Engineering or related software roles

certifications: Google: Using Python to Interact with the Operating System (2025)

honors_programs: Commonwealth Cyber Initiative (CCI) Scholar – NoVa Node (2025–2026)

bullets: Selected as a Commonwealth Cyber Initiative (CCI) Scholar for a competitive winter internship placement.
Supported frontend development for the Fisherman product, improving data risk review workflows (ingestion tracking, sensitivity indicators, severity visibility).
Completed Python scripting and internal automation tasks and supported compliance documentation aligned with NIST, ISO 27001, and SOC 2.
Assisted and maintained Microsoft Power Automate workflows for invoice intake/approvals, automating multi-step routing and current exception handling, reducing manual touches by 50%.
Validated invoice data in Microsoft Dynamics NAV and Excel to improve reconciliation accuracy and reporting quality.
Identified processing issues and improved workflows to reduce delays and strengthen data quality.
Audited vendor accounts and reconciled statements in QuickBooks and Excel.
Streamlined monthly reports by cleaning inputs and documenting repeatable steps.
Assisted with secure workflow documentation and small data migrations.

projects.name: Ridha-GPT (Personal Assistant Website)

details: React, Vite, Tailwind; Netlify Functions (Node.js) + OpenAI API.
Embeddings over resume.json; cosine similarity ranking; streamed answers.
